name: PB_BFH_FOLLOWUP_RECORDS
description: Each row of this table links the record of a user activity to the Professional Billing insurance follow-up record that the activity was performed on.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PB_FOL_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Stores the Professional Billing follow-up records on which the activity was performed.
